caption.title: The cross-reactivity of antibody d448 to flaviviruses.
caption.p: (A) Binding of d448 to the E proteins of flaviviruses was analyzed by ELISA. E proteins (100 ng/well) were coated on 96-well plate. Serial dilution of the d448 antibody was added in the coated plate for the detection of the binding, and measurement of the EC 50. (B) The neutralization activity of d448 was determined by assaying Vero cell infectivity in the presence of serial dilutions of purified antibody. DENV2 (16681 strain) was used as a positive control. Zika virus (SMGC-1 strain), yellow Fever virus (17D strain), and West Nile virus (Kunjin, MRM61C strain) were used in the study.
